lead_paragraph: As two defenders closed in with the clock winding down in the third quarter, Kevin Durant bounced a perfect pass right to Stephen Curry open on the left wing.

headline.print_headline: Kevin Durant Leads Warriors Rout Against Trail Blazers
headline.main: Kevin Durant Leads Warriors Rout Against Trail Blazers
